In the directory $ISE_EIFFEL/examples/lex you will find a system that scans Eiffel classes. It consists of the class eiffel_scan.xmlEIFFEL_SCAN. It uses the file
eiffel_regular.xml eiffel_regular as lexical grammar to analyze an Eiffel class passed on the command line.
When compiling the example, the executable eiffel_scan(.exe) is created. Use the program as follows:

As an example, when the
input.xml source code of the root class is run through the scanner, it outputs a
output.xml list of all consecutive tokens and keywords in that class to the console.
